name: Amy's Amazing Baked Chicken Breasts
author: Amy Campbell
summary: Skin-on chicken breasts are stuffed with seasoned compound butter right under the skin for the juiciest, most flavorful chicken ever!
ingredients: 1  yellow onion, cut into 5 whole slices
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Using 2 fingers, loosen the skin on each chicken breast
Thinly slice compound butter and stuff under skin to cover as much of the chicken as possible
Layer onion slices on the bottom of a glass baking dish
Place chicken breasts on top of the onions, skin-side up
Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes
Start basting chicken with its juices and rotate if skin is not crisping evenly
Continue baking until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 25 more minutes, depending on the size of the chicken breasts
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
